QuestData.Title: Entry Into the Citadel
QuestData.Description: This freshly cast mold was to be used to create a key of some sort. From the image engraved on its back, it appears to be related to Hellfire Citadel.$B$BMaybe this could prove to interest to Nazgrel, the leader of the Horde's forces in Thrallmar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Primed Key Mold to Nazgrel at Thrallmar in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.RewardText: A key mold? Could this be what grants us access to the Shattered Halls?
